NOAA Optimally Interpolated (OI) v2.1 daily 1/4 degree SST for the Mediterranean region.

Source: R/sst_med.R
sst_Med.Rd

A dataset containing the sea surface temperature (in degrees Celsius) and date for the Mediterranean region from 1982-01-01 to 2019-12-31.

sst_Med

Format

A dataframe with 13879 rows and 2 variables:

t

date, as.Date() format

temp

SST, in degrees Celsius

...

Source

https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/oisst

Details

lon/lat: 9/43.5
